name: fabric-put
title: Put
description: This activity stores data to fabric ledger
author: Yueming Xu

settings.name: compositeKeys
settings.description: composite keys and field names as object map[string][]string, e.g. {index1: [attr1,attr2]}

settings.name: keysOnly
settings.description: Create specified composite keys only, not the state.

settings.name: createOnly
settings.description: if true, do not update existing ledger state.

inputs.name: data
inputs.description: keys and/or JSON object values to be updated on the ledger or private data collection

inputs.name: privateCollection
inputs.description: name of private data collection, or blank if not private data

outputs.name: message
outputs.description: serialized result string from the ledger, or error message

outputs.name: result
outputs.description: keys and JSON object values corresponding to the updated states or composite keys
